title.value: Monte Carlo simulated correction factors of a novel phantom for brachytherapy dosimetry audits
title.justification: The title is explicitly mentioned in the paper.
title.quote: PD-0505 Monte Carlo simulated correction factors of a novel phantom for brachytherapy dosimetry audits

extractions.description: The paper presents a study on obtaining correction factors using the Monte Carlo method for brachytherapy dosimetry audits. It outlines the simulation of a PMMA phantom using RapidBrachyMCTPS for HDR Ir-192, aiming to address lack of scatter and non-water equivalence in phantom and dosimeter materials.

type.justification: The paper involves simulations and empirical analyses to obtain correction factors for dosimetry audits, indicating an empirical approach.
type.quote: The aim of this study was to obtain correction factors using MC method...

name.justification: The study deals with dosimetry audits and simulations for brachytherapy, which falls under the domain of medical physics.
name.quote: Independent dosimetry audits have potential to prevent catastrophic errors and minimise systematic dose deviations in high dose rate HDR BT.

name.justification: The study specifically focuses on dosimetry audits and simulations in the context of brachytherapy.
name.quote: PD-0505 Monte Carlo simulated correction factors of a novel phantom for brachytherapy dosimetry audits

name.justification: The model used for simulations is explicitly named in the paper.
name.quote: A PMMA phantom of 16 cm × 8 cm × 3 cm containing two channels on either side of a RPLD located at the centre of a phantom was simulated using RapidBrachyMCTPS for HDR Ir-192.

is_contributed.justification: The model is used for simulation rather than being developed or contributed by the paper's authors.
is_contributed.quote: ...was simulated using RapidBrachyMCTPS for HDR Ir-192, model Ir2.A85-2 source.

is_executed.justification: The model is executed as part of the study's simulations.
is_executed.quote: ...was simulated using RapidBrachyMCTPS for HDR Ir-192, model Ir2.A85-2 source.

is_compared.justification: The model itself is not compared with other models in this study.
is_compared.quote: The aim of this study was to obtain correction factors using MC method...

referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper's title for the model is not mentioned.

name.justification: The RPLDs are mentioned as part of the material setup in simulations and provide measurement data, functioning as a dataset.
name.quote: RPLDs are made of silver-activated phosphate glass (FD7) with a 1.5 mm diameter and 12 mm length... were used in the simulation.

referenced_paper_title.justification: No referenced paper title is provided for the dataset.

name.justification: The Monte Carlo method is the computational technique used in the study to simulate correction factors.
name.quote: The aim of this study was to obtain correction factors using MC method...

referenced_paper_title.justification: No specific paper is referenced for the Monte Carlo method.
